author.bio:
Faith, Hope, and Love is the path to Life, Liberty, and Happiness.

There is no justification for any human authority.
author.bio_html:
Faith, Hope, and Love is the path to Life, Liberty, and Happiness.

There is no justification for any human authority.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

post.title: Do you actively pray and hope for Christ's return in your lifetime?

body:
I've never really thought about it. I always thought that if He did return his message would probably be rejected or He would be killed. 

We definitely need something though. Everything is a mess right now.
body_html:
I've never really thought about it. I always thought that if He did return his message would probably be rejected or He would be killed.

We definitely need something though. Everything is a mess right now.

post.title: Do you actively pray and hope for Christ's return in your lifetime?

body: I think about it often, but at the same time I don’t. I mean that I often think about *the event of* His second coming, but I don’t think about the time thereof. I simply just leave that to God, because, of course, He is the only One Who knows when. I also sometimes pray, “Come Lord Jesus,” or I’ll say “Maranatha (used in 1 Cor. 16:22),” which means, “the Lord comes,” or, “is coming.”
body_html: I think about it often, but at the same time I don’t. I mean that I often think about the event of His second coming, but I don’t think about the time thereof. I simply just leave that to God, because, of course, He is the only One Who knows when. I also sometimes pray, “Come Lord Jesus,” or I’ll say “Maranatha (used in 1 Cor. 16:22),” which means, “the Lord comes,” or, “is coming.”

body: Even the first disciples thought it was imminent within their lifetimes, which is evident from Paul's letters and other works. Be careful not to underestimate how long a short time according to God is to us, every single generation has been proclaiming the end is nigh for 2021 years now and it always turns out to not be. We simply don't know.
body_html: Even the first disciples thought it was imminent within their lifetimes, which is evident from Paul's letters and other works. Be careful not to underestimate how long a short time according to God is to us, every single generation has been proclaiming the end is nigh for 2021 years now and it always turns out to not be. We simply don't know.

body: Why would it be cryptocurrency? The mark is a mark of allegiance to the beast, not anything else. Besides Revelation has unclear origins, and if it is indeed forged (or more fulfilled than most think) then 666/616 is probably a reference to Nero.
body_html: Why would it be cryptocurrency? The mark is a mark of allegiance to the beast, not anything else. Besides Revelation has unclear origins, and if it is indeed forged (or more fulfilled than most think) then 666/616 is probably a reference to Nero.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.
